COM.sootNsmoke.scheme
Class SchemeCompiler

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--COM.sootNsmoke.instructions.Instructions
        |
        +--COM.sootNsmoke.scheme.SchemeCompiler
public class SchemeCompiler
extends Instructions
implements RuntimeConstants

A compiler which compiles Scheme into Java bytecodes. The main entry point is compileExpression, which takes a Scheme expression and returns a Sequence, which is our abstraction of a sequence of JVM instructions. Each instruction sequence expects that a BindingEnv is stored in variable slot 1.
